email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore - Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

I hope this email finds you well. We are looking to charter a vessel for a shipment of iron ore from Port Hedland to Qingdao. The cargo size is approximately 180,000 MT, and we are considering CFR terms. Could you provide a freight quote and vessel availability for a laycan around December 10-15?

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Maritime Trade Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore - Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for your inquiry. We have the vessel OCEAN HORIZON available for your shipment. She has a DWT of 205,000 and an LOA of 300m. The initial freight quote is USD 18.50 per metric tonne, CFR. The laycan can be adjusted to December 10-15 as requested.

Please let me know if this works for you or if you need further details.

Best regards,
Sophia Nguyen
Global Cargo

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore - Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

Thank you for the prompt response. USD 18.50 seems a bit high given the current market. Could you consider revising the rate to USD 17.75 per metric tonne? Additionally, could you confirm the demurrage rate and provide the vessel's last three B/Ls for review?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore - Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Lucas,

I understand your concern regarding the rate. After reviewing, I can offer a revised rate of USD 18.00 per metric tonne, which is the best we can do at this time. The demurrage rate is USD 20,000 per day, pro rata. I will forward the vessel's last three B/Ls shortly.

Let me know if this revised rate works for you.

Best regards,
Sophia

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore - Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

Thank you for the revised rate. USD 18.00 per metric tonne is acceptable. Please proceed with the booking for the OCEAN HORIZON with the laycan of December 10-15. Kindly send over the recap and the B/Ls for our records.

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Confirmed: Iron Ore - Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Lucas,

Great! The booking is confirmed. Below is the recap:

Commodity: Iron Ore
Quantity: 180,000 MT
Load Port: Port Hedland
Discharge Port: Qingdao
Incoterms: CFR
Vessel: OCEAN HORIZON
Freight: USD 18.00/MT
Laycan: 10-15 Dec 2023
Demurrage: USD 20,000/day pro rata.

Attached are the last three B/Ls for your review. Let me know if you need anything else.

Best regards,
Sophia

[ATTACHMENTS: BL_history.pdf]
